participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: shy but friendly, struggles with confidence, enjoys fantasy worlds.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: outgoing and sociable, loves meeting new people, has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.

content.text: i am sorry , i am sorry to hear that .
i am a teacher , and i am a teacher , and you ?
i am a redhead , and i am a redhead , so i am not much of a reader , but i do not know much about them .
